name: SIG_TMPLT_BASIC_FIELDS
description: This table includes basic information about the templates that are used to create Electronic Signature documents.

columns.name: DOC_TMPLT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the template record.

columns.name: TMPLT_NAME
columns.description: The database name for the document template.

columns.name: TEMPLT_DISPLAY_NAME
columns.description: A name for the template designed for display purposes.
